游니 Full URL: https://fakerestapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v1/Books
游 Headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8' }
游닍 Body: {
  "id": 2,
  "title": "Test Book",
  "description": "Auto-generated book",
  "pageCount": 100,
  "excerpt": "Excerpt...",
  "publishDate": "2025-04-07T16:14:05.128Z"
}
游닌 Server response text: {"id":2,"title":"Test Book","description":"Auto-generated book","pageCount":100,"excerpt":"Excerpt...","publishDate":"2025-04-07T16:14:05.128Z"}
游늵 Status: 200
游니 Full URL: https://fakerestapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v1/Books/2
游 Headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8' }
游닍 Body: undefined
游닌 Server response text:
